name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
steps: Gather all ingredients: tortilla wrap, cooked chicken breast, Caesar dressing, lettuce, and grated parmesan.
Place the cooked chicken breast on a chopping board and cut into bite-sized pieces or strips.
In a small bowl, add the chopped chicken pieces.
Spoon in the Caesar dressing and mix until chicken is coated evenly.
Lay the tortilla wrap flat on a clean surface or plate.
Place washed lettuce leaves in the centre of the wrap.
Spoon the chicken Caesar mixture onto the lettuce.
Sprinkle grated parmesan cheese evenly over the chicken.
Fold in the sides of the tortilla wrap slightly, then roll it tightly from bottom to top to secure the filling.
Slice the wrap in half diagonally for easier eating.
Serve immediately with optional extra salad on the side.

name: Tuna Salad Sandwich
steps: Gather all ingredients: canned tuna, mayonnaise, bread slices, lettuce, and tomato.
Open the can of tuna and drain the liquid completely.
Place the drained tuna into a small mixing bowl.
Add mayonnaise to the tuna.
Mix thoroughly with a fork until the tuna and mayonnaise are well combined.
Wash the lettuce leaves and tomato.
Slice the tomato into thin slices.
Lay two slices of bread flat on a clean surface or plate.
Place lettuce leaves onto one slice of bread.
Spoon the tuna mayonnaise mixture onto the lettuce, spreading it evenly.
Lay tomato slices on top of the tuna mixture.
Place the second slice of bread on top to form a sandwich.
Cut the sandwich in half diagonally if desired.
Serve immediately.

name: Chickpea Salad Bowl
steps: Gather all ingredients: canned chickpeas, cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, and olive oil.
Open the can of chickpeas, drain, and rinse thoroughly under cold water. Set aside to drain.
Wash the cucumber and tomatoes.
Dice the cucumber into small cubes.
Dice the tomatoes into small pieces.
Peel the red onion and finely dice half of it.
Place the drained chickpeas into a mixing bowl.
Add the diced cucumber, tomatoes, and red onion to the chickpeas.
Drizzle olive oil over the salad mixture.
Mix gently with a spoon until everything is combined and evenly coated with olive oil.
Optional: season with salt, pepper, or a squeeze of lemon juice.
Transfer to a serving bowl and serve immediately.

name: Turkey & Hummus Wrap
steps: Gather all ingredients: tortilla wrap, turkey breast slices, hummus, and spinach.
Lay the tortilla wrap flat on a clean surface or plate.
Using a knife or spoon, spread hummus evenly across the entire surface of the wrap.
Lay turkey breast slices evenly over the hummus layer.
Wash the spinach thoroughly and pat dry.
Place a handful of spinach on top of the turkey slices, spreading it evenly.
Fold in the sides of the tortilla wrap slightly.
Roll the wrap tightly from bottom to top to secure all fillings.
Slice the wrap in half diagonally for easier eating if desired.
Serve immediately as a light, protein-rich lunch.

name: Egg Fried Rice
steps: Gather all ingredients: cooked rice, eggs, mixed frozen vegetables, and soy sauce.
If you do not have pre-cooked rice, cook rice according to packet instructions and allow to cool slightly before using.
Heat a non-stick frying pan or wok over medium-high heat.
Add a small amount of oil if needed to prevent sticking.
Pour mixed frozen vegetables into the pan.
Stir-fry the vegetables for 2-3 minutes until they begin to soften.
Push the vegetables to one side of the pan to create space.
Crack both eggs into the empty space in the pan.
Scramble the eggs using a spatula until fully cooked through.
Mix the scrambled eggs together with the vegetables.
Add the cooked rice into the pan.
Pour soy sauce over the rice mixture.
Stir everything together thoroughly, ensuring rice is heated through and evenly coated with soy sauce.
Cook for an additional 2 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Transfer to a bowl or plate and serve hot.

name: Beef Burrito Bowl
steps: Gather all ingredients: cooked rice, ground beef, black beans, corn kernels, and sour cream.
Heat a pan over medium heat and cook the ground beef until browned.
Add black beans and corn kernels to the pan, stirring to combine.
Warm the cooked rice in a microwave or on the stove.
Place the rice in a bowl as the base.
Top with the beef, beans, and corn mixture.
Dollop sour cream on top.
Serve immediately.

name: Avocado Toast
steps: Gather all ingredients: bread, avocado, lemon juice, and salt.
Toast the bread until golden brown.
Cut the avocado in half, remove the pit, and scoop the flesh into a bowl.
Mash the avocado with a fork and mix in lemon juice and salt.
Spread the mashed avocado evenly on the toasted bread.
Serve immediately.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
steps: Gather all ingredients: broccoli, bell pepper, carrot, soy sauce, and oil.
Chop the broccoli, bell pepper, and carrot into bite-sized pieces.
Heat oil in a pan over medium-high heat.
Add the chopped vegetables to the pan and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until tender.
Add soy sauce and stir to coat the vegetables evenly.
Serve hot.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
steps: Gather all ingredients: bread, cheddar cheese, and butter.
Butter one side of each bread slice.
Place the cheese between the unbuttered sides of the bread.
Heat a pan over medium heat and place the sandwich in the pan.
Cook for 2-3 minutes on each side until the bread is golden and the cheese is melted.
Serve hot.

name: Pasta Salad
steps: Gather all ingredients: pasta, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and olive oil.
Cook the pasta according to package instructions, then drain and let cool.
Halve the cherry tomatoes and dice the cucumber.
Combine the cooled pasta, tomatoes, and cucumber in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and toss to combine.
Serve chilled.

name: Peanut Butter Banana Sandwich
steps: Gather all ingredients: bread, peanut butter, and banana.
Spread peanut butter on one side of each bread slice.
Slice the banana and place the slices on one peanut butter-covered bread slice.
Top with the other bread slice, peanut butter side down.
Cut in half if desired and serve.

name: Quinoa Bowl
steps: Gather all ingredients: quinoa, avocado, cherry tomatoes, and lemon juice.
Cook quinoa according to package instructions, then let cool slightly.
Halve the cherry tomatoes and dice the avocado.
Combine the quinoa, tomatoes, and avocado in a bowl.
Drizzle with lemon juice and toss gently.
Serve immediately.

name: Ham & Cheese Panini
steps: Gather all ingredients: bread, ham, Swiss cheese, and butter.
Butter one side of each bread slice.
Place the ham and cheese between the unbuttered sides of the bread.
Heat a panini press or pan over medium heat.
Cook the sandwich for 2-3 minutes on each side until the bread is crispy and the cheese is melted.
Serve hot.

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
steps: Gather all ingredients: Greek yogurt, granola, and honey.
Layer half of the yogurt in a bowl or glass.
Sprinkle half of the granola on top.
Repeat the layers with the remaining yogurt and granola.
Drizzle honey on top.
Serve immediately.

name: Caprese Salad
steps: Gather all ingredients: tomato, fresh mozzarella, fresh basil, and olive oil.
Slice the tomato and mozzarella into even slices.
Arrange the tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate, alternating them.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the slices.
Drizzle with olive oil.
Serve immediately.

name: Vegetable Soup
steps: Gather all ingredients: carrot, celery, onion, and vegetable broth.
Dice the carrot, celery, and onion.
Heat a pot over medium heat and add the diced vegetables.
Sauté for 5 minutes until softened.
Add the vegetable broth and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
Serve hot.

name: Salmon Rice Bowl
steps: Gather all ingredients: cooked rice, salmon fillet, avocado, and soy sauce.
Cook the salmon fillet in a pan over medium heat for 4-5 minutes per side.
Slice the avocado.
Place the cooked rice in a bowl.
Top with the cooked salmon and sliced avocado.
Drizzle with soy sauce.
Serve immediately.

name: Spinach & Feta Omelette
steps: Gather all ingredients: eggs, spinach, feta cheese, and oil.
Heat oil in a pan over medium heat.
Whisk the eggs in a bowl and pour into the pan.
Add spinach and crumbled feta cheese to one half of the omelette.
Fold the other half over the filling and cook for another minute.
Serve hot.

name: Chicken Pasta Salad
steps: Gather all ingredients: pasta, cooked chicken breast, cherry tomatoes, and mayonnaise.
Cook the pasta according to package instructions, then drain and let cool.
Dice the cooked chicken breast and halve the cherry tomatoes.
Combine the pasta, chicken, and tomatoes in a bowl.
Add mayonnaise and toss to combine.
Serve chilled.

name: Mushroom Risotto
steps: Gather all ingredients: Arborio rice, mushrooms, vegetable broth, and Parmesan cheese.
Slice the mushrooms and sauté in a pan until softened.
Add the Arborio rice and stir to coat with the mushrooms.
Gradually add the vegetable broth, stirring frequently, until the rice is cooked and creamy.
Stir in the grated Parmesan cheese.
Serve hot.

name: Beef Taco
steps: Gather all ingredients: taco shells, ground beef, lettuce, and tomato.
Cook the ground beef in a pan until browned.
Dice the tomato and shred the lettuce.
Fill each taco shell with ground beef, lettuce, and tomato.
Serve immediately.

name: Fruit Salad
steps: Gather all ingredients: apple, banana, and orange.
Dice the apple and banana.
Peel and segment the orange.
Combine all fruits in a bowl.
Serve immediately.

name: Shrimp Stir Fry
steps: Gather all ingredients: shrimp, bell pepper, soy sauce, and oil.
Slice the bell pepper into strips.
Heat oil in a pan over medium-high heat.
Add the shrimp and bell pepper to the pan and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes.
Add soy sauce and stir to coat.
Serve hot.

name: Chicken Quesadilla
steps: Gather all ingredients: tortilla, cooked chicken breast, cheddar cheese, and sour cream.
Shred the cooked chicken breast.
Place the tortilla on a pan over medium heat.
Sprinkle half of the cheese on one half of the tortilla.
Add the shredded chicken and remaining cheese.
Fold the tortilla in half and cook until the cheese is melted and the tortilla is crispy.
Serve with sour cream.

name: Lentil Soup
steps: Gather all ingredients: lentils, carrot, onion, and vegetable broth.
Dice the carrot and onion.
Rinse the lentils under cold water.
Combine all ingredients in a pot and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 20-25 minutes until the lentils are tender.
Serve hot.

name: Pesto Pasta
steps: Gather all ingredients: pasta, pesto, and Parmesan cheese.
Cook the pasta according to package instructions, then drain.
Toss the cooked pasta with pesto until evenly coated.
Sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese.
Serve immediately.

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
steps: Gather all ingredients: chicken breast, noodles, carrot, and chicken broth.
Dice the chicken breast and carrot.
Bring the chicken broth to a boil in a pot.
Add the chicken, noodles, and carrot to the pot.
Simmer for 10-12 minutes until the chicken is cooked and the noodles are tender.
Serve hot.

name: Veggie Burger
steps: Gather all ingredients: veggie patty, burger bun, lettuce, and tomato.
Cook the veggie patty according to package instructions.
Toast the burger bun lightly.
Place the cooked patty on the bun.
Top with lettuce and tomato slice.
Serve immediately.

name: Baked Potato
steps: Gather all ingredients: potato, butter, and sour cream.
Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F).
Wash the potato and pierce it with a fork several times.
Bake for 45-60 minutes until tender.
Slice open the potato and add butter and sour cream.
Serve hot.

name: Chicken Avocado Salad
steps: Gather all ingredients: cooked chicken breast, avocado, lettuce, and lemon juice.
Dice the chicken breast and avocado.
Tear the lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
Combine all ingredients in a bowl.
Drizzle with lemon juice and toss gently.
Serve immediately.

name: Egg Salad Sandwich
steps: Gather all ingredients: eggs, mayonnaise, bread, and lettuce.
Hard-boil the eggs, then peel and chop them.
Mix the chopped eggs with mayonnaise.
Place lettuce on one slice of bread.
Spread the egg mixture on top of the lettuce.
Top with the second slice of bread.
Serve immediately.

name: Stuffed Pepper
steps: Gather all ingredients: bell pepper, ground beef, cooked rice, and tomato sauce.
Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cut the top off the bell pepper and remove the seeds.
Cook the ground beef in a pan until browned, then mix with the cooked rice and tomato sauce.
Stuff the bell pepper with the beef mixture.
Bake for 25-30 minutes until the pepper is tender.
Serve hot.

name: Cucumber Tomato Salad
steps: Gather all ingredients: cucumber, tomato, olive oil, and lemon juice.
Dice the cucumber and tomato.
Combine in a bowl and drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Toss gently to combine.
Serve immediately.

name: Beef Stir Fry
steps: Gather all ingredients: beef strips, broccoli, soy sauce, and oil.
Heat oil in a pan over medium-high heat.
Add the beef strips and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes.
Add the broccoli and continue to stir-fry for another 3-4 minutes.
Add soy sauce and stir to coat.
Serve hot.

name: Cheese Omelette
steps: Gather all ingredients: eggs, cheddar cheese, and butter.
Whisk the eggs in a bowl.
Heat butter in a pan over medium heat.
Pour the eggs into the pan and cook until set.
Sprinkle cheese on one half of the omelette.
Fold the other half over the cheese and cook for another minute.
Serve hot.

name: Tomato Soup
steps: Gather all ingredients: tomatoes, onion, vegetable broth, and cream.
Dice the tomatoes and onion.
Combine in a pot with the vegetable broth and bring to a boil.
Simmer for 15 minutes, then blend until smooth.
Stir in the cream and heat through.
Serve hot.
